oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Teat Surgery: A New Approach
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lloyd, K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: teat surgery
stepped on teats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: During my years of practice I have made some observations and developed a procedure for handling those "stepped on teats" that routinely occur in most dairy operations and too often end up with the loss of a quarter or slaughter of a good cow. The procedure I will describe is not generally printed in the literature but it has served me well for 35 years.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1982; 149-151
